description: Two submarine teams are exploring a newly discovered underwater cave. Each must decide whether to wait for more data or proceed with exploration. If both wait, exploration is delayed. If both proceed, there's a risk of disorientation. If one waits while the other proceeds, exploration is conducted smoothly.

participants.name: You
participants.profile: Submarine captain from the north entrance

participants.name: Bob
participants.profile: Submarine captain from the south entrance
